<br />


The objective of this five-day training course, co-organized by the
[FRB-CESAB](https://www.fondationbiodiversite.fr/en/about-the-foundation/le-cesab/), the 
[UMS PatriNat](https://www.patrinat.fr/) and the [Cirad HortSys](https://ur-hortsys.cirad.fr/)
is to train young researchers on the methods and techniques of meta-analyses 
and systematic reviews/maps applied to the field of biodiversity.

**N.B.** This training course is **in French**, but slides are available in English in the tab `Courses/`.



<br />
